com.viaoa.jfc

Class OAPopup

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPopupMenu
            • com.viaoa.jfc.OAPopup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.MenuElement

    public class OAPopup
extends javax.swing.JPopupMenu
    PopupMenu that will bind button(s) to control open and close of a component that is within the popup. Used to add a popup/dropdown to a button.

    Example:
    OAPopup pop = new OAPopup(tree, cmdOpen, cmdClose);

    For more information about this package, see documentation.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

       javax.swing.JComponent cmdOpen)
        Create new Popup with a component that wiil cause it to popup on mouse click.
        Parameters:
        popupComponent - component to display
        cmdOpen - component that causes popup to be displayed. Popup will be display under this component.

      • OAPopup

        public OAPopup(javax.swing.JComponent popupComponent,
       javax.swing.JComponent cmdOpen,
       javax.swing.JComponent cmdClose,
       javax.swing.JComponent cmdDisplayFrom,
       int align)
        Create new Popup with components that wiil cause it to popup/hide on mouse click.
        Parameters:
        popupComponent - component to display
        cmdOpen - component that causes popup to be displayed. Popup will be display under this component.
        cmdClose - component that causes popup to be closed.
        align - SwingConstants.LEFT, RIGHT, CENTER
        cmdDisplayFrom - component used to display the popup in reference to, default is cmdOpen.
